projects.name: HyperGOAP
projects.description: A simple open-world game created in UE5 showcasing procedural terrain generation and GOAP AI.
details: Procedural terrain generation using Markov Chain Models.
Objects and foliage placement to build a realistic open-world.
GOAP AI architecture for NPCs.

projects.name: SAD
projects.description: A game engine created using C++ and ECS architecture.
details: C++ game engine showcased with a shooter-survival game.
ECS architecture for game objects and components.
Include lighting, scripting and ray-casting.
Allows moving player-camera
Supportsrendering of 3D models and materials.
Cel-shading for rendering.
CI/CD pipeline for automated testing.
projects._comment: TODO: Replace images 2-4, they have blue light filter in them ðŸ˜­

projects.name: Illume
projects.description: A visually story rich game that follows the story of a girl and the future of the forest.
details: Made using Unity
Low poly art style.
Level design from moodboard to final implementation.
Storytelling and character development.

projects.name: Focus Breakout
projects.description: A 3D adventure game where you play as a target orb trying to survive and escape the aim trainer simulation.
details: Set in a simulation of a target training game.
3 levels of varying difficulty.
Puzzle and obstacle solving.

projects.name: Trial Date Calculator
projects.description: A tool to automate calendar invites/reminders for important deadlines leading up to the trial date.
details: In-house tool built using Sharepoint Online and Power Automate for a law firm.
Hosted on a local Flask server.
Automated hour long process of setting up calendar invites and Outlook tasks down to 5 minutes.

projects.name: Octopations
projects.description: A Jackbox-style party game creted for the Global Game Jam 2024.
details: Players take turns convincing the Hiring Manager (an octopus) that they are PERFECT for the job based on their past experiences.
A UI based party game create in UE5.
UI elements created using Unreal's UMG.
Gameplay mechanics created using Blueprints.

projects.name: Cownado
projects.description: An action-arcade game where you move cows to safety during a ridiculous storm. Created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2024.
details: A 2D action-arcade game created in Godot.
Gameplay mechanics created using GDScript.

projects.name: Windows Image Deployment
projects.description: Streamlined and optimized the deployment of Windows images as part of the Harper Grey LLP equipment refresh process.
details: Reduced imaging time from 1 hour to 10 minutes.
Cleaned up and optimized package/software deployment process using PDQ.
Managed the deployment of over 200 computers and laptops at the firm.

projects.name: Hamstars
projects.description: Compete with up to 4 friends as a hamster in this fast-paced peanut hoarding brawl. Created during the Town One Game Jam, May 2022.
details: Winner of the Town One Artisan Award ðŸŽ¨
Created using Unity
Hop in a hamster ball and squash the competition.
Collect and hoard peanuts before time runs out.
